subject: Attention Please,
body:
Attention Please,
I am Mrs.Roselline Barrow; I am a US citizen, 59 years Old Woman. I
reside in the State of Texas 75773. My residential address is as
follows 23329 Live Oak Dr.Mineola,Texas 75773, United States,i am
thinking of moving since I am now wealthy, I was one of those that took
part in the Compensation in Europe/America/Asia/Africa many years ago and they
refused to pay me.
I had spent  over us$200,000 us Dollars, while in
the United State, trying to get my funds all to no availed .So, I
decided to travel down to Asia precisely Indonesia
with all my compensation documents, and I was directed to
meet Barrister Antonio Guterres who is the member of
OUTSTANDING PAYMENT AWARD COMMITTEE and a Human
Rights Activist(Lawyer) and I contacted him and he explained everything to me.
He said that whoever is contacting them through emails are fake. He took me
the paying bank for of my Compensation payment and i have received my
compensation
and right now I am the happiest woman on earth because I have received
my compensation
funds which $9,500,000.00.  Moreover, Barrister Antonio Guterres
showed me the full
information of those that won lottery and those whose inheritance had
not been paid and the list of all outstanding contractor that were owed
that are yet to receive their payments in Europe/America/Asia/Africa
and I saw your
information's as one of the scam victims,
I decided to email you to stop dealing with
those people, they are not with your fund,they are only making money
out of you.I will advise you to contact
You really have to stop dealing with those people that are contacting
you and telling you that your fund is with them, that they are
Government officials it is not in anyway with them,
they are only taking advantage of you and they will dry you up until
you have nothing. 
Take Note, the only money I paid after I met Barrister
Antonio Guterres, was just $179.00 for the paper works
, take note of
that.
Thank You and Be Blessed.
Mrs.Roselline Barrow.
23329 Live Oak Dr.Mineola
Texas 75773 USA.

subject: Re: Attention Please,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing your story with me. It sounds like you've been through quite an ordeal! I'm glad to hear that you were finally able to receive your funds with the help of Barrister Antonio Guterres.

I'm curious, how did you come across Barrister Antonio Guterres in the first place? And what made you decide to trust him after all the trouble you had been through?

Also, could you tell me more about these paper works that cost money? What kind of documents were they and why were they necessary?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jeff
